featured.text: With a continuous 3 km stretch of golden sand, the beach attracts artists around the world each summer to create amazing _____ with its fine soft sand.
With this feature, it could be stretched and 33 various clip-like objects.
Continuous as the stars that shine And twinkle on the Milky Way, They stretched in never-ending line Along the margin of a bay:
With the crisis now in its fifth year, basic public services, including education, inside Syria have been stretched to breaking point.
Stretch limousines were hired to drive the prom-goers to expensive restaurants or discos for an all-night extravaganza.

definition.zh_def: 伸展，拉長或擴展的動作或狀態。
definition.en_def: To extend or enlarge in length, width, or scope.
definition.example: She likes to stretch before her workout.
